name: Android Java Developer Group of Louisville
body:
### Welcome to Android Java Developer of Louisville.

Sponsors:  
O'Reilly Books. Please, consider purchasing from them. They have been very generous and supportive of this group.  

![Sponsor](http://www.oreilly.com/partner_file/ORM_logo_box75_hex.jpg)
[http://www.oreilly.com/pub/cpc/1738](O'Reilly Partner)  

***

Group Links:  
[AJSD Group on FaceBook](https://www.facebook.com/ajsdlou/)  
[AJSD Group on Twitter](https://twitter.com/AjsdgLou)  
[AJSD on Meetup](http://www.meetup.com/Android-Software-Development/)  
[AJSD on Linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/groups/7017395)  

***
Android Asset Manager for app images. And links for Googles image software. Software to create images in the correct Density-independent pixels.
[Android Asset Studio](http://romannurik.github.io/AndroidAssetStudio/)  

Material design is a guide for visual, motion, and interaction design across platforms and devices. 
[Android Material Design for Developers](https://developer.android.com/training/material/index.html)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
